top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Well if you drink alcohol and drive around with a bike  you get your license revoked in my country...

Pretty useless in a giant bike stall

I personally have a "tile" on my bike, it's one of those locator thingies, press a button on the app on my phone and it's alarm goes off, and tells you if it's close by or not

If you’re getting so drunk you forgot where your bike is,

Don’t bike home.
